fields.name: tagHandling
fields.comment: Sets which kind of tags should be handled. Options currently available: * `xml`: Enable XML tag handling; see [XML Handling](https://www.deepl.com/docs-api/xml). * `html`: Enable HTML tag handling; see [HTML Handling](https://www.deepl.com/docs-api/html).

fields.name: nonSplittingTags
fields.comment: Comma-separated list of XML tags which never split sentences

fields.name: splittingTags
fields.comment: Comma-separated list of XML tags which always cause splits.
